title: Tired Racism, FLAVORTOWN > Columbus  6.23.20
itunes:title: Tired Racism, FLAVORTOWN > Columbus  6.23.20
description:
In episode 657, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Guy Montgomery to discuss Trump's Tulsa rally, a petition for the city of Columbus to change it's name to Flavortown, Scientology trying to use Covid-19 to recruit, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. How TikTok Users Targeted Trump Rally
  2. Organized TikTok campaigns jammed up Trump rally tickets by the hundreds
  3. Did TikTokers and K-pop fans foil Trump’s Tulsa rally? It’s complicated.
  4. Duval County, Florida Survey: A Survey of Duval County, FL Voters
  5. Goodbye, Columbus. Hello... Flavortown?
  6. Restaurants Have Accidentally Promoted Coronavirus Info From Scientologists
  7. Scientology volunteers spend R100m disinfecting buildings and taxis to fight Covid-19
  8. We Asked the Church of Scientology How They’re Combatting Coronavirus. This Is Their Wild Response.
  9. WATCH: Classica Orchestra Afrobeat - Zombie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
